Name: ChimneyEntryObj
Notes: An invisible point that teleports the player to a specified position, just like a Warp Pipe. However, this works in one way only.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.

NamePos.Description: Additional placements that can be freely placed.

Values.Value: マリオ顔惑星煙突出口
